#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int isPrime[100001];
main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n,k,i,j,low,mid,high,c=0,cnt,x;
        cin>>n>>k;
        if(k==0)
        {
            x=(n*(n-1))/2;
            cout<<x<<endl;
        }else{
        isPrime[1]=0;
        isPrime[2]=1;
        for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
        isPrime[i]=1;
        cnt=2;
       while(cnt <= n){
    if (isPrime[cnt]){
      for (long i = 2; i <= n/cnt; i++){
   isPrime[i*cnt] = 0;
      }
    }
    cnt++;
       }
       for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
        isPrime[i]+=isPrime[i-1];
       for(i=2;i<=(n-k+1);i++)
       {
           low =i+k-1;
           high =n;
           while(low<=high)
           {
               mid = (low+high)/2;
               x= isPrime[mid]-isPrime[i-1];
               if(x>k)
               {
                   high=mid-1;
               }
               else if(x<k)
               {
                   low=mid+1;
               }
               else
               {

                   while((isPrime[mid-1]-isPrime[i-1])==k)
                    mid--;
                   c+=(n-mid+1);
                   break;
               }
           }
       }

cout<<c<<endl;
}

    }



}
